Find EPA-regulated facilities in FRS by NAICS code (industrial category)

Source: R/latlon_from_naics.R
regid_from_naics.Rd

Get lat lon, Registry ID, given NAICS industry code(s) Find all EPA Facility Registry Service (FRS) sites with this exact NAICS code (not subcategories)

regid_from_naics(naics, id_only = FALSE)

Arguments

naics

a vector of naics codes, or a data.table with column named code, as with output of naics_from_any()

Value

A data.table (not just data.frame) with columns called lat, lon, REGISTRY_ID, NAICS (but see the id_only parameter)

Details

NOTE: many FRS sites lack NAICS code!

Also, this function does not find the sites identified by FRS data as being in a child NAICS (subcategory of your exact query)!

Relies on frs_by_naics (a data.table)

See info about NAICS industry codes at https://www.naics.com/search

Examples

  regid_from_naics(321114)
#>           lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID  NAICS
#>   1: 18.41565  -66.20266 110000307837 321114
#>   2: 42.69898  -73.82309 110000324505 321114
#>   3: 41.71228  -73.93705 110000324809 321114
#>   4: 40.08626  -76.18172 110000333826 321114
#>   5: 40.18434  -74.79960 110000336253 321114
#>  ---                                        
#> 493: 35.59275  -84.46818 110071307905 321114
#> 494: 35.42391  -87.28222 110071334308 321114
#> 495: 37.50455 -122.21792 110071380069 321114
#> 496: 39.79828 -104.99275 110071414306 321114
#> 497: 35.89974  -88.75981 110071434078 321114
  latlon_from_naics(321114)
#>           lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID  NAICS
#>   1: 18.41565  -66.20266 110000307837 321114
#>   2: 42.69898  -73.82309 110000324505 321114
#>   3: 41.71228  -73.93705 110000324809 321114
#>   4: 40.08626  -76.18172 110000333826 321114
#>   5: 40.18434  -74.79960 110000336253 321114
#>  ---                                        
#> 493: 35.59275  -84.46818 110071307905 321114
#> 494: 35.42391  -87.28222 110071334308 321114
#> 495: 37.50455 -122.21792 110071380069 321114
#> 496: 39.79828 -104.99275 110071414306 321114
#> 497: 35.89974  -88.75981 110071434078 321114
  latlon_from_naics(EJAM::naics_from_any("cheese")[,code] )
#> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion
#> Warning: mynames should be non-NA character vector of text to look for in industry title(s) like "concrete"
#>           lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID  NAICS
#>   1: 44.18750  -75.95694 110000326102 311513
#>   2: 42.87593  -78.86949 110000326825 311513
#>   3: 42.83404  -78.82388 110000327183 311513
#>   4: 41.47924  -81.07851 110000385798 311513
#>   5: 43.59796  -85.14557 110000410207 311513
#>  ---                                        
#> 397: 44.91011  -72.79787 110071292784 311513
#> 398: 42.84509  -90.69292 110071433364 311513
#> 399: 42.84416  -73.98835 110071433604 311513
#> 400: 32.87831 -111.78364 110071434204 311513
#> 401: 44.75453  -90.29649 110071498797 311513
  head(latlon_from_naics(c(3366, 33661, 336611), id_only=TRUE))
#> [1] "110000897290" "110000332621" "110000360564" "110000369869" "110000377333"
#> [6] "110000448962"
  # mapfast(frs_from_naics(336611)) # simple map
